title: >>> The FIRE STILL Burns
body_text:
Can you feel it? That f*ckin' rush of adrenaline ...
The Fire Still Burns
Set in stone is one awesome, octane-filled music compilation [complete with theme song "We Didn't Start the Fire" by Billy Joel] put together by the legend himself, Chris Adams.
Who's Going to
100
?
Ten names, two spots. For the veterans, the "backbone" if you will, their hard-earned reward has come. The following players have a once in a lifetime opportunity to headline the biggest one of them all,
DODGEBALL 100
, on August 18 ...
John Tronolone, Diana DiBuccio, Chris Adams, Kevin Adams, Justin Pierce, Mike "Sputz" Krott, Tom Adams, Kevin Fitzpatrick, Kevin Megill, Steve Adams.
Get Your Programs Here!
For the first time in dodgeball history, "programs" have been printed and will be distributed! Take a look at the season in review, dating back to matches such as the "2005 vs. 2007" classic between Kevin Adams and Grant Cornero, the return of the famed
Rimshot Contest
, Edwards vs. Butler, and more! Programs will also tell the "Tale of the Tape" as icons Justin Pierce and Tom Adams prepare for battle.
The Main Event
Somebody's got to win, and somebody's got to lose. The titantic clash between court general Justin Pierce and the "god"-like Tom Adams will finally go down. Truly one of the biggest and baddest matches ever!
............................
Born on September 3, 2005, the sport - the family gathering - reaches a milestone event with DODGEBALL 90 on June 2.
Unreal
.
body_html:
Can you feel it? That f*ckin' rush of adrenaline ...


The Fire Still Burns
Set in stone is one awesome, octane-filled music compilation [complete with theme song "We Didn't Start the Fire" by Billy Joel] put together by the legend himself, Chris Adams.

Who's Going to 100 ?
Ten names, two spots. For the veterans, the "backbone" if you will, their hard-earned reward has come. The following players have a once in a lifetime opportunity to headline the biggest one of them all, DODGEBALL 100, on August 18 ... John Tronolone, Diana DiBuccio, Chris Adams, Kevin Adams, Justin Pierce, Mike "Sputz" Krott, Tom Adams, Kevin Fitzpatrick, Kevin Megill, Steve Adams.

Get Your Programs Here!
For the first time in dodgeball history, "programs" have been printed and will be distributed! Take a look at the season in review, dating back to matches such as the "2005 vs. 2007" classic between Kevin Adams and Grant Cornero, the return of the famed Rimshot Contest, Edwards vs. Butler, and more! Programs will also tell the "Tale of the Tape" as icons Justin Pierce and Tom Adams prepare for battle.

The Main Event
Somebody's got to win, and somebody's got to lose. The titantic clash between court general Justin Pierce and the "god"-like Tom Adams will finally go down. Truly one of the biggest and baddest matches ever!

............................

Born on September 3, 2005, the sport - the family gathering - reaches a milestone event with DODGEBALL 90 on June 2. Unreal.
